p: α-glucosidase and α-amylase are the key enzymes for controlling the postprandial blood sugar level and managing hyperglycemia. The aqueous extract of C. coccineum demonstrated a relatively high α-glucosidase inhibitory activity and a moderate inhibition of α-amylase, indicating that the edible plant can be a diet-based solution for managing the early stages of diabetes when coupled with other pharmacological management strategies [ 27].
